column1: Uchi////A few notes - new head sushi chef.  Apparently he's the real deal.  Before Uchi got by on its swag and creative and tasty dishes such as the Brussel Sprouts and Escolar.  The new chef is probably from Japan
column2: because the fish is so much fresher
column4: and is very serious.  Now you can get Hokkaido uni (like butter!)
column6: so many fish and still freshly grated wasabi!   They even make note that it is better to eat sushi fish side first on your tongue.  Yum!
